other_tests.findings: Ulcer on tongue and superficial ulcers on the right cheek and left ala nasi.
other_tests.changes_over_time: All three lesions had improved four weeks after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Positive syphilis antibody test and positive TPPA assay with a titre of >1:5120; RPR was positive with a titre of 1:16.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat serology showed improved findings after treatment.
